templates.template: You'll be charged on the same day each month (or year for annual plans) based on the date you started your subscription. You'll receive an invoice email 3 days before each charge. You can view your next billing date and history in your account dashboard under 'Billing History'.

We accept major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover), debit cards, ACH bank transfers (annual plans), and PayPal (monthly plans). All payments are processed securely through our PCI-compliant payment processor. You can update your payment method anytime in Settings > Billing.

To update your payment method: 1) Log into your account dashboard, 2) Navigate to Settings > Billing, 3) Click 'Update Payment Method', 4) Enter your new payment details, and 5) Save changes. The new method will be used for your next billing cycle.

All your invoices are available in your account dashboard under 'Billing History'. You can view and download them as PDF files anytime. Receipts are also automatically emailed to you after each successful payment.

If a payment fails, you'll receive an immediate email notification. We'll automatically retry after 3 days and again after 7 days. You can also manually retry the payment anytime in your dashboard. If all retries fail, your account will be suspended after 15 days. Please update your payment method to avoid service interruption.

We offer three plans: Basic ($29/mo) with 5 users and 10GB storage, Professional ($79/mo) with 25 users and 100GB storage plus API access, and Enterprise (custom pricing) with unlimited users, 1TB+ storage, and a dedicated account manager. Annual billing saves 16%. You can compare all features in your account dashboard.

You can upgrade your plan anytime in Settings > Subscription. Upgrades take effect immediately with a prorated charge for the remainder of your current billing period. New features and increased limits are available instantly after upgrading.

You can downgrade your plan in Settings > Subscription. Downgrades take effect at the end of your current billing period, so you'll continue to have full access until then. Please ensure your data fits within the new plan's limits before downgrading.

You can cancel your subscription anytime in Settings > Subscription. Your service will continue until the end of your paid period. No refunds are provided for partial months/years. After cancellation, you'll have 30 days to export your data before it's permanently deleted.

To reset your password: 1) Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, 2) Enter your account email, 3) Check your email for a reset link (valid for 1 hour), 4) Create a new password. If you don't receive the email, check your spam folder or contact support for assistance.

Accounts are locked after 5 failed login attempts for security. The lockout lasts 30 minutes, or you can use the unlock link sent to your email. If you're still unable to access your account, please contact our support team with your account email address for assistance.

Two-factor authentication (2FA) adds extra security to your account. To enable it: 1) Go to Settings > Security, 2) Click 'Enable 2FA', 3) Scan the QR code with an authenticator app, 4) Enter the verification code, 5) Save your recovery codes. We recommend using an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Authy.

To add users to your account: 1) Go to Settings > Team Management, 2) Click 'Invite User', 3) Enter their email and select their role (Admin, Member, or Viewer), 4) Click Send Invitation. They'll receive an email to create their account. Note: user limits depend on your subscription plan.

To export your data: 1) Go to Settings > Data Export, 2) Select the data types you want to export, 3) Choose your format (CSV, JSON, or ZIP), 4) Click 'Request Export'. You'll receive an email with a download link within 24 hours. Exports are available for 7 days after creation.

API access is available on Professional and Enterprise plans. To get started: 1) Go to Settings > API Keys, 2) Generate a new API key, 3) Review our API documentation at docs.yoursaas.com/api. Keep your API key secure - it provides full access to your account data. You can revoke keys anytime if needed.

We take data security seriously. Your data is protected with 256-bit AES encryption at rest, TLS 1.3 encryption in transit, and we're SOC 2 Type II certified. We perform regular security audits, automatic backups every 6 hours, and offer optional two-factor authentication. We never access your data without your explicit permission.

If the app is loading slowly, try these steps: 1) Clear your browser cache and cookies, 2) Check your internet connection, 3) Disable browser extensions temporarily, 4) Try a different browser. If the issue persists, it may be related to large files or network conditions. Contact support with details about your setup for further assistance.

Upload failures typically occur when: 1) File size exceeds your plan's limits (Basic: 2GB, Professional: 5GB, Enterprise: 10GB per file), 2) Storage quota is exceeded, or 3) Network connection is unstable. Try uploading on a stable connection or use our desktop app for large files. Check your storage usage in Settings > Storage.

We have native mobile apps for iOS (App Store) and Android (Google Play). The apps include offline access to starred files, push notifications, camera upload, and biometric login. Download the app from your device's app store and log in with your existing account credentials. The apps are free with any subscription.

We support the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. We recommend Chrome or Firefox for the best experience. Internet Explorer is not supported. For mobile, we support Safari on iOS 14+ and Chrome on Android 10+. Some features may have limited functionality on older browser versions.

Our support team is available 24/7 via email and chat. Phone support is available Monday-Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM EST. Enterprise customers have access to 24/7 priority phone support. For urgent issues outside business hours, use our emergency escalation line (Enterprise only) or submit a high-priority ticket through your dashboard.
